product_name: La Sportiva Solution Rock Shoes - Men's
long_description: Wrapped in sticky Vibram(R) XS Grip2 rubber and drastically downturned, the La Sportiva Solution Rock Shoes hook, grab, edge and smear on the smallest rock features that you can find. La Sportiva Solution Rock Shoes are ideal for overhanging sport routes, bouldering, gym climbing and technical face climbing. Patented P3(R) power platform retains the downturned shape of the shoes for excellent performance on steep, overhanging routes. Lock Harness System(R) surrounds your feet and weds them to the uppers for a perfect fit. Adjustable Fast Lacing System(TM) lets you tailor the quick-closing rip-and-stick closures for a personalized fit. 4mm-thich Vibram XS Grip2 rubber supplies incredible friction and resistance to wear.
short_description: Wrapped in sticky Vibram(R) XS Grip2 rubber and drastically downturned, the La Sportiva Solution Rock Shoes hook, grab, edge and smear on the smallest rock features that you can find.
